title: Singed The Man Who Laughs (Patch 5.13)

embed.description: "...laughing while flinging is the biggest buff we've given a champion in the history of League of Legends" - Pwyff & Scarizard (Riot Games) 5.13 Patch notes: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-513-notes Crash Bandicoot: Twin Sanity - Rock Slide Rumble (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0UuLPBN8lxs) Thomas Dolby - She Blinded Me With Science (Instrumental) (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-FIMvSp01C8) Outro song: Tobu - Higher (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=blA7epJJaR4)

body:
I have been trying Singed recently mainly due to his new change where fling causes him to laugh. Here are some matches I've played!

"...laughing while flinging is the biggest buff we've given a champion in the history of League of Legends" - Pwyff & Scarizard (Riot Games)

Thanks for watching!
